Reviews.Title: “Great central hotel in Paris!!!”
Reviews.Author: vyelena
Reviews.Content: excellent location central quiet 500 meters walking arc de triomphe champs elysées closest metro ternes blocks hotel staff friendly helpful english speaking double wasnt comfortable clean equipped tv satellite channels air conditioning wardrobe tea coffee facilities free wifi access balcony nice clean bathroom street minimarket couple bars restaurants brasseries breakfast brunch easiest hotel air france shuttle airport arrives arc de triomphe definitely hotel visit paris

Reviews.Title: “Near the Arc de Triomphe”
Reviews.Author: LeitaLuetta
Reviews.Content: location easily walkable eiffel tower le cars air france bus cdg arc location walk hotel luggage taxi taxi favorable short distance overcharged son arrived car parking nearby public garage days cost 70 euros breakfast hotel 13 euros typically clean comfortable nice staff quality corner market close able coffee sandwiches sweets yogurt etc helped food budget hotel windows insulated ouside noise overall price quality proximity tourist activities arc doubledeck bus top deck sky tourist stops restaurants near hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good quality in good location”
Reviews.Author: polkadotj86
Reviews.Content: top 6th floor bathroom clean hairdryer wardrobe desk minibar safe reception staff nice spoke english hotel 5 minute walk champs elysees arc de triomphe easily accesible metro ternes closest breakfast pretty expensive cafe avenue called la sells croissants pain au chocolat etc 120 euros overall happy hotel quality location

Reviews.Title: “Old, small and noisy”
Reviews.Author: FBumm
Reviews.Content: can´t recommend hotel location central paris tiny front desk unfriendly clean due coming travellers noisy survived couple romantic weekend paris nightmare

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Small Rooms, Good rates.”
Reviews.Author: JPE905
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights location 500 meters arc de short walk roller luggage air france bus route 2 dining ants single walls thin consider hotel wife single buisness traveller budget breakfast decent 13 euro consider nearby mcdonalds paid 85 euro night bad central paris forget near airport money tv didnt usefull monitor volcanoes iceland

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN Empire Elysees
HotelInfo.Address: 3 Rue Montenotte | 17th Arr., 75017 Paris, France
